tool.name: KNeighborsCoefficient
tool.description: : Wrapper of the scikit-learn KNeighborsClassifier method.

param.name: input_dataset_path
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: Path to the input dataset. Format: [input].csv

param.name: outname_output_results_path
param.label: output CSV name
param.help: Path to the accuracy values list Format: [output].csv

param.name: outname_output_plot_path
param.label: output PNG name
param.help: Path to the accuracy plot Format: [output].png

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: independent_vars
param.label: independent_vars
param.help: Independent variables or columns from your dataset you want to train. (Json)

param.name: target
param.label: target
param.help: Dependent variable or column from your dataset you want to predict.

param.name: metric
param.label: metric
param.help: The distance metric to use for the tree.
param.option: euclidean - Computes the Euclidean distance between two 1-D arrays
minkowski - Compute the Minkowski distance between two 1-D arrays
wminkowski - Compute the weighted Minkowski distance between two 1-D arrays
seuclidean - Return the standardized Euclidean distance between two 1-D arrays
mahalanobi - Compute the Mahalanobis distance between two 1-D arrays

param.name: max_neighbors
param.label: max_neighbors
param.help: Maximum number of neighbors to use by default for kneighbors queries.

param.name: random_state_train_test
param.label: random_state_train_test
param.help: Controls the shuffling applied to the data before applying the split.

param.name: test_size
param.label: test_size
param.help: Represents the proportion of the dataset to include in the test split. It should be between 0.0 and 1.0.

param.name: scale
param.label: scale
param.help: Whether or not to scale the input dataset.
